wikipedia_page.main: This is a list of all cricketers who have played first-class, list A or Twenty20 cricket for Auckland cricket team. Seasons given are first and last seasons; the player did not necessarily play in all the intervening seasons.

response: * Stephen Adams (composer) or  Michael Maybrick (1841–1913), English composer
* Stephen Adams (business) (born 1937), American businessman and private equity investor
* Stephen Adams (politician) (1807–1857), U.S. Representative and Senator from Mississippi
